name: Trivia Party
description: Trivia Party was my first coding project. The app allows a user to cycle through and answer a variety of trivia questions from the OpenTriviaDB. Features an API, AJAX, Javascript, HTML, & CSS.

name: Inspired Eating Meal Planner
description: The app allows user to keep track of their weekly meals. Features RESTful routes, MVC, MongoDB & Mongoose, Heroku, JavaScript, Node.js, HTML & CSS

name: Therapist Finder
description: This app is the result of a group project and a personal passion of mine - providing individuals access to mental health professionals.Features full CRUD application using Express, React, MongoDB, React Google Login, Netlify, Heroku, JavaScript, Node.js, HTML & CSS
